title: Buildings belonging to the Central Government, the State Government, Semi- Government Organizations
clause_text: Buildings belonging to the Central Government, the State Government, Semi- Government Organizations and Municipal Corporations, as well as Institutional Buildings, Office Buildings, tenanted Municipal Buildings, Staff Quarter Buildings of Municipal Corporation , that are at least 30 years of age with prior consent of the respective Authority;
